original_text: The night before Herod was to bring him to trial, Peter was sleeping between two soldiers, bound with two chains, and sentries stood guard at the entrance.
korean_text: 헤롯이 잡아 내려고 하는 그 전날 밤에 베드로가 두 군인 틈에서 두 쇠사슬에 매여 누워 자는데 파수꾼들이 문 밖에서 옥을 지키더니

sentences.original_text: The night before Herod was to bring him to trial
sentences.korean_translation: 헤롯이 그를 재판에 넘기기 전날 밤

sentences.original_text: Peter was sleeping between two soldiers
sentences.korean_translation: 베드로는 두 군사 사이에서 자고 있었으며

sentences.original_text: and sentries stood guard at the entrance
